entry.title: Proposal to update BIP-32
entry.summary: On May 8, 2016, Pavol Rusnak wrote to the bitcoin-dev mailing list asking for Sipa's opinion on a proposed backwards compatible fix. Marek Palatinus also requested Sipa's input and expressed his support for the proposal. However, Sipa had not been active on the mailing list for some time and did not receive the message.
